Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: General comment: please merge this patch with your previous one. It’s nice when code and documentation changes come in one commit, so that when tracking down a feature in the git log you have the corresponding documentation.

Author: Paul Grove

Author: Paul Grove
Comment: No they have to subscribe to the particular name in my implementation.  There may have been a mis-communication when we talked about this before.  The implementation allows for IPC clients to subscribe to arbitrary event names, the client will only receive events matching those names.
